name: Mobile Electronic Kamibot
description:
A paper robot fighting game, inspired by Pokémon, Robopon and Telefang.

Make your own attacks, customize your robot's hardware and more!

Project for Game Boy Jam #7.

Controls

In-game Buttons
Keyboard InputsD-PadArrow keys/WASDAXBCStartEnterSelectCtrl

Team

Code, Art and Design - Switch

Music and Sound Effects - Choso

Special Thanks: Sergi Lazaro
